content.content:
CREATE TABLE client
(
    client_id   INTEGER        not null
        primary key,
    gender      TEXT not null,
    birth_date  DATE       not null,
    district_id INTEGER        not null,
    foreign key (district_id) references district (district_id)
);
CREATE TABLE district
(
    district_id INTEGER default 0 not null
        primary key,
    A2          TEXT   not null,
    A3          TEXT   not null,
    A4          TEXT       not null,
    A5          TEXT           not null,
    A6          TEXT           not null,
    A7          TEXT           not null,
    A8          INTEGER        not null,
    A9          INTEGER           not null,
    A10         REAL not null,
    A11         INTEGER           not null,
    A12         REAL null,
    A13         REAL not null,
    A14         INTEGER           not null,
    A15         INTEGER        null,
    A16         INTEGER          not null
);
CREATE TABLE account
(
    account_id  INTEGER default 0 not null
        primary key,
    district_id INTEGER default 0 not null,
    frequency   TEXT   not null,
    date        DATE          not null,
    foreign key (district_id) references district (district_id)
);
CREATE TABLE disp
(
    disp_id    INTEGER        not null
        primary key,
    client_id  INTEGER        not null,
    account_id INTEGER        not null,
    type      TEXT not null,
    foreign key (account_id) references account (account_id),
    foreign key (client_id) references client (client_id)
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE client
(
    client_id   INTEGER        not null
        primary key,
    gender      TEXT not null,
    birth_date  DATE       not null,
    district_id INTEGER        not null,
    foreign key (district_id) references district (district_id)
);
CREATE TABLE district
(
    district_id INTEGER default 0 not null
        primary key,
    A2          TEXT   not null,
    A3          TEXT   not null,
    A4          TEXT       not null,
    A5          TEXT           not null,
    A6          TEXT           not null,
    A7          TEXT           not null,
    A8          INTEGER        not null,
    A9          INTEGER           not null,
    A10         REAL not null,
    A11         INTEGER           not null,
    A12         REAL null,
    A13         REAL not null,
    A14         INTEGER           not null,
    A15         INTEGER        null,
    A16         INTEGER          not null
);
CREATE TABLE account
(
    account_id  INTEGER default 0 not null
        primary key,
    district_id INTEGER default 0 not null,
    frequency   TEXT   not null,
    date        DATE          not null,
    foreign key (district_id) references district (district_id)
);
CREATE TABLE disp
(
    disp_id    INTEGER        not null
        primary key,
    client_id  INTEGER        not null,
    account_id INTEGER        not null,
    type      TEXT not null,
    foreign key (account_id) references account (account_id),
    foreign key (client_id) references client (client_id)
);

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/financial.sqlite" "
SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM client c
JOIN disp d ON c.client_id = d.client_id
JOIN account a ON d.account_id = a.account_id
JOIN district di ON c.district_id = di.district_id
WHERE c.gender = 'F'
  AND c.birth_date < '1950-01-01'
  AND di.A2 = 'Sokolov';
"
input.description: Count female clients born before 1950 in Sokolov with opened accounts

content.text:
The query returns **8** female customers born before 1950 who lived in Sokolov and had opened accounts. The claim states there were **zero** such customers.

Let me double-check the birth_date format and results:

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/financial.sqlite" "
SELECT c.client_id, c.gender, c.birth_date, di.A2
FROM client c
JOIN disp d ON c.client_id = d.client_id
JOIN account a ON d.account_id = a.account_id
JOIN district di ON c.district_id = di.district_id
WHERE c.gender = 'F'
  AND c.birth_date < '1950-01-01'
  AND di.A2 = 'Sokolov';
"
input.description: List female clients born before 1950 in Sokolov

content.text:
There are clearly 8 female customers born before 1950 living in Sokolov with opened accounts, not zero.
